column4: I read on the internet that the only way to remove the constraint on the keys is to use gconftool-2
but somebody knows what is the command to remove these cursed constraints draw_background and picture_filename with gconftool-2?
hold on.  I'm checking
go to your home folder and press ctrl + H to see hidden folders.  Rename the .gconf folder to .gconf_old, logout and login back
you should have reset your gconf settings
i'm trying
did you logout of gnome and login back?
Yes I did log out of gnome, the problem is on another pc
thats how mozilla gives it.  You can directly run it
can you check if you have a new .gconf and .gconf_old?
the .gconf new is always wrong
well, any changes you make in gconf editor is done to gconf folder.  Once you rename it, a new one should be created for you without errors
so can you confirm that the old one called .gconf_old and a new .gconf folder is in your home directory?
however, the changes in gconf-editor i did in OEM installatio
the new gconf folder and the old gconf folder are in my home directory
you made the changes in gconf from OEM install, then I'm sorry, but I dont think I'll be able to help :(
my suggestion would be to create a new gconf on another computer and copy the entire folder there.  That might work
don't worry, you're helping a lot, now I try to copy the gconf folder
nothing
even after a re-login?
a moment
nothing
sorry then.. I'm not sure how to fix it :(
don't worry and thanks of all
